column4: When I run the kubuntu removal command (The really long one) in the terminal I get the error "E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11: Resource temporarily unavailable)
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?
2010-08-13T02:07:00.000Z	iceroot	Tomwa	use sudo and check if another process like synaptic or apt-get is running
